casebody.data:
HASSELL
v.
BOARD OF EDUCATION. No. 172A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 7, 2008. Gary Scarzafava, Assistant Attorney General, John F. Maddrey, Assistant Solicitor General, for Onslow County Board of Education. George W. Lennon, Raleigh, for NCATL.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of December 2007 by Plaintiff to Withdraw as Counsel:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 7th day of May 2008."
